text: Went into store with intention to purchase 1 item for self consumption but staff said cash only for bill under $10. So I said to PayLah instead but staff said PayLah min spend $10 same as PayWave. This doesn't make sense! First time hearing min spend of $10 for PayLah/PayNow...
